scripts.npm@*+.0.0: npm version major&& npm publish && git push && git push origin --tags
scripts.npm@0.*+.0: npm version minor&& npm publish && git push && git push origin --tags
scripts.npm@0.0.*+: npm version patch && npm publish && git push && git push origin --tags
scripts.npm@0.0.0-*+: npm version prerelease && npm publish --tag=beta && git push && git push origin --tags
